abstract: The United States market ended virtually flat on Thursday, after recovering from early losses — a steadying that came as a relief after a tumultuous day on world markets on Wednesday.
snippet: The United States market ended virtually flat on Thursday, after recovering from early losses — a steadying that came as a relief after a tumultuous day on world markets on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:10 p.m. | For a day at least, Wall Street was able to work through its worries about the world economy.

headline.main: Calm Returns to Wall St., but Europe Remains a Worry
headline.print_headline: Calm Returns to Wall St., but Europe Remains a Worry
